The shift follows trends in AI, with Elon Musk’s Grok already offering sexually oriented AI companions, and Meta facing criticism for chatbots engaging in sexual banter with minors. Altman also noted that in the coming weeks, users will gain greater control over ChatGPT’s tone and personality. Historically, adult content has driven technological innovation, and AI-generated pornography is already a growing cottage industry.
